column1: '''Alalminórë''' was a region in the centre of the island of [[Tol Eressëa]], being its fairest realm. The city of [[Kortirion]] was situated in Alalminórë.<ref name=LTI16>{{LT1

column2: 15}}, p. 5</ref> which the [[Gnomes]] also call '''''Gar Lossion''''', or the "Place of Flowers".<ref name=LTI16/>
